name: gossi/docblock
description: PHP Docblock parser and generator. An API to read and write Docblocks.

scripts-descriptions.check: Perform all tests and analysis, required before submitting a pull request
scripts-descriptions.coverage:html: Create a code coverage report in html format, into the `coverage/` directory
scripts-descriptions.coverage:clover: Create a code coverage report in xml format, into clover.xml file
scripts-descriptions.cs: Run code style analysis, without fixing errors
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix: Run code style analysis and fix errors
scripts-descriptions.api: Download `sami.phar` archive and generate the api documentation for this library
